sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    article.card.card-default(:class="'card-default_'+label")
        header.card__header(:style="{backgroundImage: 'url(' + bgImage + ')'}")
            router-link(to="/").card__hash(:style="{color: colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)]}") Application of the day
            // Math.floor(Math.random() * quotes.length)
            // colors: [
            //     "#EF3044",
            //     "#FF6433",
            //     "#59DDCD",
            //     "#357FDB"
            // ]
            .card__title Screencastify
            template(v-if="isWinOrange || isWinBlue")
                .card__trophie(:class="[isWinOrange?'card__trophie_orange':'',isWinBlue?'card__trophie_blue':'']")
                    .award
                        .award__icon
                            img(src="@/assets/img/trophie_blue.svg")
        .card__body
            p.card__text Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec in porttitor massa, nec vestibulum magna. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit.
            router-link(to="/application").card__link Download
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'Card',
    data: function(){
        return {
            colors: [
                "#EF3044",
                "#FF6433",
                "#59DDCD",
                "#357FDB"
            ]
        }
    },
    props: {
        bgImage: {
            type: String,
            default: ''
        },
        isWinOrange: {
            type: Boolean,
            default: false
        },
        isWinBlue: {
            type: Boolean,
            default: false
        },
        label: {
            type: String,
            default: ''
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .card {
        height: 405px;
        box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.08);
        border-radius: 6px;
        display: block;
        overflow: hidden;
        // width: 32.02%;
        width: 383px;
        transition: .3s all ease;
        position: relative;

        &:hover {
            box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.13);
        }

        &__header {
            text-align: center;
            height: 178px;
            position: relative;
            // background: url('../../../assets/uploads/card-bg-4.png'), linear-gradient(142.31deg, #FFBC77 6.92%, #FF8284 91.53%);
            background-color: #a1a1a1;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-position: center;
            background-size: cover;
        }

        &__hash {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 22px;
            color: #FF6433;
            display: inline-block;
            padding-top: 18px;
        }

        &__title {
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Semibold';
            font-size: 33px;
            line-height: 36px;
            color: #FFFFFF;
        }

        &__body {
            padding: 32px 48px 42px 48px;
            text-align: center;
            // position: relative;
        }

        &__text {
            font-family: 'Roboto-Light';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 300;
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 22px;
            color: #35343E;
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin-bottom: 22px;

            min-height: 86px;
        }

        &__link {
            width: 139px;
            height: 40px;
            background: transparent;
            border: 1px solid rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.2);
            box-sizing: border-box;
            border-radius: 100px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Semibold';
            font-size: 10px;
            line-height: 19px;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            color: #37393E;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin: 0 auto;
            transition: .3s all ease;
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            bottom: 42px;
            transform: translateX(-50%);

            &:hover {
                border: 1px solid rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.5);
            }
        }
        &__trophie {
            position: absolute;
            right: -6px;
            top: 24px;
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            &_orange {
                .award {
                    &__icon {
                        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #E8AA6B 0%,#F55A43 100%);
                        &:before {
                            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #FFBC77 0%,#FE6C56 100%);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            &_blue {
                .award {
                    &__icon {
                        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #83A5FC 0%,#3182E7 100%);
                        &:before {
                            background-color: #E8F0FF;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    .award {
        position: relative;
        display: inline-block;
        margin-bottom: 95px;
        margin-left: 11px;
        &__icon {
            position: relative;
            width: 32px;
            height: 32px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            z-index: 2;
            img {
                position: absolute;
                top: 50%;
                left: 50%;
                transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
                width: 13px;
                height: 14px;
            }
            &:before {
                content: "";
                position: absolute;
                top: 50%;
                left: 50%;
                transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
                width: calc(100% + 18px);
                height: calc(100% + 18px);
                border-radius: 50%;
                opacity: .23;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .card {
            width: 290px;

            &__body {
                padding: 32px 30px 42px 30px;
            }

            &__link {
                bottom: 35px;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 960px) {
        .card {
            width: 48%;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 640px) {
        .card {
            height: 400px;
            width: 100%;

            &__header {
                height: 183px;
            }

            &__hash {
                padding-top: 21px;
            }

            &__title {
                margin-left: 0;
                font-size: 33px;
                line-height: 36px;
                padding-top: 13px;
            }

            &__body {
                padding-top: 30px;
            }

            &__text {
                max-width: 287px;
                letter-spacing: -0.2px;
            }
        }
    }
</style>
